encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Updated display name and added passage details to metadata.
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - See M. Sampson's comments
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - See M. Sampson's comments

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Some tidying required: First line is missing (it should be [.?].1[.?] ), so add and renumber the subsequent lines; codd. should read χρέωνται in l.1; middots in l.1 and l.3 should be *high-punctus* as per ed.pr.; in l.2 δὲ is the reading in codd. except C; in l. 4 ἑκατέρηι is ABCP while ἑκάτερον is DRSV; the transposition of φορέουσι in l. 5 should be noted in a comment (in the codd. it comes after τῶν κνημέων); fix word-wrap line break at l. 5-6 AND l. 6-7; in l. 5-6 encode (NB correct my word wrap) <:χάλ-[.5-6].2||alt||χάλ-κεον τ]ὰ̣ς̣|χάλ-κειον τ]ὰ̣ς̣:>; add line number for lost.?lin at end of fragment. Meta: delete volume number from biblio 9607; update online resource with link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3379--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH019b21ad0a9b498d39918eee); Herodotus is CWKB author 915 and work 2691; script type is mixed style (as per ed.pr.); MP3 is 474.2; correct spelling of Oxyrhynchos and add geo ref https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Some tidying required: First line is missing (it should be [.?].1[.?] ), so add and renumber the subsequent lines; codd. should read χρέωνται in l.1; middots in l.1 and l.3 should be *high-punctus* as per ed.pr.; in l.2 δὲ is the reading in codd. except C; in l. 4 ἑκατέρηι is ABCP while ἑκάτερον is DRSV; the transposition of φορέουσι in l. 5 should be noted in a comment (in the codd. it comes after τῶν κνημέων); fix word-wrap line break at l. 5-6 AND l. 6-7; in l. 5-6 encode (NB correct my word wrap) <:χάλ-[.5-6].2||alt||χάλ-κεον τ]ὰ̣ς̣|χάλ-κειον τ]ὰ̣ς̣:>; add line number for lost.?lin at end of fragment. Meta: delete volume number from biblio 9607; update online resource with link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3379--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH019b21ad0a9b498d39918eee); Herodotus is CWKB author 915 and work 2691; script type is mixed style (as per ed.pr.); MP3 is 474.2; correct spelling of Oxyrhynchos and add geo ref https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983.

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.10 by Natalie Gleason. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission and voting notes were: “Submitting for Todd Hickey's Herodotus (GRK 120) class at UC Berkeley“
